Test Instructions

	Test 1:

Frist prompt enter: NUF2

Second Prompt enter: hg18

Third prompt enter: Y

	Test 2:

First prompt choose NUF2.txt

Second prompt enter: NUF2

Third prompt enter nucl

Fourth prompt enter hg18

	Test 3:

First prompt choose NUF2.txt

Second prompt choose bam file in test folder

Third prompt enter: Sample1

Fourth prompt enter: 50

	Test 4:

First prompt choose NUF2.txt

Second prompt enter: NUF2

Third prompt enter: 0

Fourth prompt enter: 5

	Test 5:

First prompt enter: blastn

Second prompt enter: NUF2

	Test 6:

First prompt enter: NUF2
